\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l00180}00180     \textcolor{comment}{!    several routines for handling his problem.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l00181}00181     \textcolor{comment}{!}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l00182}00182     \textcolor{comment}{!    for both quadrature over finite and over infinite intervals,}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l00183}00183     \textcolor{comment}{!    one of the first questions to be answered by the user is}}

\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l00188}00188     \textcolor{comment}{!}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l00189}00189     \textcolor{comment}{!    (1) the user may not care about computer time, or not be}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l00190}00190     \textcolor{comment}{!        willing to do any analysis of the problem. especially when}}

\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l00192}00192     \textcolor{comment}{!        can be perfectly reasonable. in this case it is clear that}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l00193}00193     \textcolor{comment}{!        either the most sophisticated of the routines for finite}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l00194}00194     \textcolor{comment}{!        intervals, qags, must be used, or its analogue for infinite}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l00195}00195     \textcolor{comment}{!        intervals, qagi. these routines are able to cope with}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l00196}00196     \textcolor{comment}{!        rather difficult, even with improper integrals.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l00197}00197     \textcolor{comment}{!        this way of proceeding may be expensive. but the integrator}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l00198}00198     \textcolor{comment}{!        is supposed to give you an answer in return, with additional}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l00199}00199     \textcolor{comment}{!        information in the case of a failure, through its error}}

\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l00201}00201     \textcolor{comment}{!        cannot be totally reliable.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l00202}00202     \textcolor{comment}{!}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l00203}00203     \textcolor{comment}{!    (2) the user may want to examine the integrand function.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l00204}00204     \textcolor{comment}{!        if bad local difficulties occur, such as a discontinuity, a}}

\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03847}03847     \textcolor{comment}{!}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03848}03848     \textcolor{comment}{!  Discussion:}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03849}03849     \textcolor{comment}{!}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03850}03850     \textcolor{comment}{!    This routine calculates an approximation RESULT to an integral}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03851}03851     \textcolor{comment}{!      I = integral of F(X) * W(X) over (a,b), }}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03852}03852     \textcolor{comment}{!    where W(X) shows a singular behavior at the endpoints, hopefully }}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03853}03853     \textcolor{comment}{!    satisfying:}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03854}03854     \textcolor{comment}{!      | I -\/ RESULT | <= max ( epsabs, epsrel * |I| ).}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03855}03855     \textcolor{comment}{!}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03856}03856     \textcolor{comment}{!  Author:}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03857}03857     \textcolor{comment}{!}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03858}03858     \textcolor{comment}{!    Robert Piessens, Elise de Doncker-\/Kapenger, }}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03859}03859     \textcolor{comment}{!    Christian Ueberhuber, David Kahaner}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03860}03860     \textcolor{comment}{!}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03861}03861     \textcolor{comment}{!  Reference:}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03862}03862     \textcolor{comment}{!}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03863}03863     \textcolor{comment}{!    Robert Piessens, Elise de Doncker-\/Kapenger, }}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03864}03864     \textcolor{comment}{!    Christian Ueberhuber, David Kahaner,}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03865}03865     \textcolor{comment}{!    QUADPACK, a Subroutine Package for Automatic Integration,}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03866}03866     \textcolor{comment}{!    Springer Verlag, 1983}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03867}03867     \textcolor{comment}{!}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03868}03868     \textcolor{comment}{!  Parameters:}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03869}03869     \textcolor{comment}{!}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03870}03870     \textcolor{comment}{!    Input, external real(RK) F, the name of the function routine, of the form}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03871}03871     \textcolor{comment}{!      function f ( x )}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03872}03872     \textcolor{comment}{!      real(RK) f}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03873}03873     \textcolor{comment}{!      real(RK) x}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03874}03874     \textcolor{comment}{!    which evaluates the integrand function.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03875}03875     \textcolor{comment}{!}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03876}03876     \textcolor{comment}{!    Input, real(RK) A, B, the limits of integration.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03877}03877     \textcolor{comment}{!}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03878}03878     \textcolor{comment}{!    Input, real(RK) ALFA, BETA, parameters used in the weight function.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03879}03879     \textcolor{comment}{!    ALFA and BETA should be greater than -\/1.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03880}03880     \textcolor{comment}{!}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03881}03881     \textcolor{comment}{!    Input, integer(IK) INTEGR, indicates which weight function is used:}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03882}03882     \textcolor{comment}{!    = 1  (x-\/a)**alfa*(b-\/x)**beta}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03883}03883     \textcolor{comment}{!    = 2  (x-\/a)**alfa*(b-\/x)**beta*log(x-\/a)}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03884}03884     \textcolor{comment}{!    = 3  (x-\/a)**alfa*(b-\/x)**beta*log(b-\/x)}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03885}03885     \textcolor{comment}{!    = 4  (x-\/a)**alfa*(b-\/x)**beta*log(x-\/a)*log(b-\/x)}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03886}03886     \textcolor{comment}{!}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03887}03887     \textcolor{comment}{!    Input, real(RK) EPSABS, EPSREL, the absolute and relative accuracy requested.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03888}03888     \textcolor{comment}{!}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03889}03889     \textcolor{comment}{!    Input, integer(IK) LIMIT, an upper bound on the number of subintervals}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03890}03890     \textcolor{comment}{!    in the partition of (A,B), LIMIT >= 2.  If LIMIT < 2, the routine }}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03891}03891     \textcolor{comment}{!     will end with IER = 6.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03892}03892     \textcolor{comment}{!}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03893}03893     \textcolor{comment}{!    Output, real(RK) RESULT, the estimated value of the integral.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03894}03894     \textcolor{comment}{!}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03895}03895     \textcolor{comment}{!    Output, real(RK) ABSERR, an estimate of || I -\/ RESULT ||.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03896}03896     \textcolor{comment}{!}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03897}03897     \textcolor{comment}{!    Output, integer(IK) NEVAL, the number of times the integral was evaluated.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03898}03898     \textcolor{comment}{!}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03899}03899     \textcolor{comment}{!            ier    -\/ integer(IK)}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03900}03900     \textcolor{comment}{!                     ier = 0 normal and reliable termination of the}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03901}03901     \textcolor{comment}{!                             routine. it is assumed that the requested}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03902}03902     \textcolor{comment}{!                             accuracy has been achieved.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03903}03903     \textcolor{comment}{!                     ier > 0 abnormal termination of the routine}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03904}03904     \textcolor{comment}{!                             the estimates for the integral and error}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03905}03905     \textcolor{comment}{!                             are less reliable. it is assumed that the}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03906}03906     \textcolor{comment}{!                             requested accuracy has not been achieved.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03907}03907     \textcolor{comment}{!                         = 1 maximum number of subdivisions allowed}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03908}03908     \textcolor{comment}{!                             has been achieved. one can allow more}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03909}03909     \textcolor{comment}{!                             subdivisions by increasing the value of}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03910}03910     \textcolor{comment}{!                             limit. however, if this yields no}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03911}03911     \textcolor{comment}{!                             improvement it is advised to analyze the}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03912}03912     \textcolor{comment}{!                             integrand, in order to determine the}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03913}03913     \textcolor{comment}{!                             integration difficulties which prevent}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03914}03914     \textcolor{comment}{!                             the requested tolerance from being}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03915}03915     \textcolor{comment}{!                             achieved. in case of a jump discontinuity}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03916}03916     \textcolor{comment}{!                             or a local singularity of algebraico-\/}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03917}03917     \textcolor{comment}{!                             logarithmic type at one or more interior}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03918}03918     \textcolor{comment}{!                             points of the integration range, one}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03919}03919     \textcolor{comment}{!                             should proceed by splitting up the}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03920}03920     \textcolor{comment}{!                             interval at these points and calling the}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03921}03921     \textcolor{comment}{!                             integrator on the subranges.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03922}03922     \textcolor{comment}{!                         = 2 the occurrence of roundoff error is}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03923}03923     \textcolor{comment}{!                             detected, which prevents the requested}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03924}03924     \textcolor{comment}{!                             tolerance from being achieved.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03925}03925     \textcolor{comment}{!                         = 3 extremely bad integrand behavior occurs}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03926}03926     \textcolor{comment}{!                             at some points of the integration}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03927}03927     \textcolor{comment}{!                             interval.}}
\DoxyCodeLine{\Hypertarget{QuadPackSPR__mod_8f90_source_l03928}03928     \textcolor{comment}{!                         = 6 the input is invalid, because}}
